sections.heading: Contracts; Nebraska workmen preferred
sections.text: Such contract shall provide that, wherever possible, workmen who are citizens of Nebraska shall be employed by the contractor.SourceLaws 1933, c. 86, ยง 10, p. 351;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 70-710;Laws 1943, c. 146, ยง 4, p. 524;R.S.1943, ยง 70-640.
